::Darkfate::

"Sharpclaws, go with Perceptor and be ready... We could need Pluton" 
Looking to Scorponok, Darkfate was pleased to find a bot who would be 
a great warrior. 

"Pleased to meet you, Scorponok" said the dragon-bot "I know that you 
freely want join us... and I'm very pleased that you're on my side. 
Did ladies or Sharpclaws tell you about situation here?"

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Robert Dahl <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> Scorponok began clanking his claws nervously looking up at the 
towering
> robot, a bit nervous he stands to attention and salutes the new 
commander
> by clanging his claw to hi head "yes sir, Scorponok reporting for 
duty sir"
> he stammers off, a little suprised in his eagerness to follow this
> stranger, but he had been used to remaining loyal, it always was 
benifitial
> to him and his commanders.
